### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam power plant at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position 0.5, 6.0)
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5)
- Pipe groups connecting the boiler and steam engine (various positions)

### Iron plate factory at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chests (multiple positions including 46.5, -83.5 and 48.5, -83.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) and a stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough pipes in your inventory to connect the Boiler and Steam Engine before attempting to do so.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure that the Offshore Pump is in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
